flexDirection: "column" }, header: { display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between", alignItems: "center", padding: "14px 20px", borderBottom: "1px solid #1f2937", background: "rgba(11,18,32,0.9)", backdropFilter: "blur(6px)", position: "sticky", top: 0, zIndex: 10 }, brand: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: 12 }, logo: { fontSize: 28 }, title: { fontWeight: 700, letterSpacing: 0.3 }, subtitle: { fontSize: 12, opacity: 0.7 }, nav: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: 8 }, navBtn: { background: "transparent", border: "1px solid transparent", color: "#cbd5e1", padding: "8px 10px", borderRadius: 8, cursor: "pointer" }, userChip: { background: "#111827", border: "1px solid #334155", padding: "8px 10px", borderRadius: 999 }, logoutBtn: { background: "#111827", border: "1px solid #334155", color: "#e5e7eb", padding: "8px 10px", borderRadius: 8, cursor: "pointer" }, main: { width: "min(1100px, 92%)", margin: "20px auto", flex: 1 }, hero: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "1.5fr 1fr", gap: 20, alignItems: "stretch" }, h1: { margin: 0, fontSize: "2rem", lineHeight: 1.2 }, lead: { marginTop: 8, opacity: 0.85 }, ctaRow: { display: "flex", gap: 10, marginTop: 16, flexWrap: "wrap" }, primary: { background: "#2563eb", border: "1px solid #1d4ed8", color: "white", padding: "10px 14px", borderRadius: 10, fontWeight: 600, cursor: "pointer" }, secondary: { background: "#0f172a", border: "1px solid #334155", color: "#e5e7eb", padding: "10px 14px", borderRadius: 10, cursor: "pointer" }, tertiary: { background: "transparent", border: "1px dashed #334155", color: "#e5e7eb", padding: "10px 14px", borderRadius: 10, cursor: "pointer" }, badges: { display: "flex", gap: 8, marginTop: 12, flexWrap: "wrap" }, badge: { background: "#0f172a", border: "1px solid #334155", padding: "6px 10px", borderRadius: 999, fontSize: 12, opacity: 0.9 }, heroCard: { background: "#0f172a", border: "1px solid #334155", borderRadius: 14, padding: 16 }, heroCardHeader: { fontWeight: 600, borderBottom: "1px solid #1f2937", paddingBottom: 8 }, quickGrid: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "1fr 1fr", gap: 8 }, quickItem: { background: "#0b1220", border: "1px solid #1f2937", borderRadius: 12, padding: 12, cursor: "pointer" }, quickIcon: { fontSize: 20 }, quickTitle: { fontWeight: 600, marginTop: 6, color: "#fff" }, quickDesc: { color: "#fff", fontSize: 12 }, footer: { marginTop: 30, padding: "18px 20px", borderTop: "1px solid #1f2937", display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between" } };
